overview: Les Vieilles Canailles is the name of the trio bringing together singers Jacques Dutronc , Eddy Mitchell and Johnny Hallyday . Les Vieilles Canailles performed for the first time on the Bercy stage , where they gave six performances, from November 5 to 10, 2014 . In June and July 2017 , the trio reform during a tour in France , Belgium and Switzerland .
title: Les Vieilles Canailles
